lead_paragraph: That is how much Americans spend each year on alternative and complementary medicines and procedures. None of it is covered by insurance.
snippet: That is how much Americans spend each year on alternative and complementary medicines and procedures. None of it is covered by insurance.
abstract: Americans spend $30.2 billion a year on alternative and complementary medicines, none of it covered by health insurance; sum represents small percentage of overall health care costs but large portion of out-of-pocket spending.
